s-1.ptxt: CHECK INSTRUMENT PANEL PASSENGER AIRBAG ASSEMBLY (VEHICLE NOT INVOLVED IN COLLISION AND AIRBAG NOT DEPLOYED)

s2.ptxt: Perform a diagnostic system check (See page ).
With the instrument panel passenger airbag installed on the vehicle, perform a visual check. If there are any defects as mentioned below, replace the instrument panel with a new one:
Cuts, minute cracks, or marked discoloration on the instrument panel around the instrument panel passenger airbag.

s-1.ptxt: CHECK INSTRUMENT PANEL PASSENGER AIRBAG ASSEMBLY (VEHICLE INVOLVED IN COLLISION AND AIRBAG NOT DEPLOYED)

s2.ptxt: Perform a diagnostic system check (See page ).

With the instrument panel passenger airbag removed from the vehicle, perform a visual check. If there are any defects as mentioned below, replace the instrument panel passenger airbag, instrument panel or instrument panel reinforcement with a new one:

item.ptxt: Cuts, minute cracks, or marked discoloration on the instrument panel passenger airbag.
Cracks or other damage to the connectors.
Deformation or cracks in the instrument panel or instrument panel reinforcement.

atten2.ptxt: For removal and installation procedures of the instrument panel passenger airbag, be sure to follow the correct procedure.
